name: Zara Men's Striped Short Sleeve T-Shirt
description: Relaxed fit shirt made of viscose and linen blend fabric. Camp collar and short sleeves. Button-up front.

name: Zara Men's Beach Short Sleeve T-Shirt
description: Relaxed fit shirt with a camp collar and short sleeves. Split hem and a button-up front.

description: Knit polo-style shirt made of spun cotton fabric. Collar with open front. Short sleeves. Ribbed trims.
